mapper.update: update REPORT set PID = #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AID = #{aid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DID = #{did,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WID = #{wid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TID = #{tid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RETIM = #{retim,jdbcType=DATE}, DES = #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REA = #{rea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NUM = #{num,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FINTIM = #{fintim,jdbcType=DATE} where RID = #{rid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select RID, PID, AID, DID, WID, TID, RETIM, DES, REA, STATE, NUM, FINTIM from REPORT
